General.Name: Ashmore Group Plc
General.Description: Ashmore Group plc is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm primarily provides its services to retail and institutional clients. It manages separate client-focused equity and fixed income portfolios. The firm also launches and manages equity and fixed income mutual funds for its clients. It invests in the public equity and fixed income markets in emerging markets across the globe. The firm employs combination of fundamental analysis to make its investments. Ashmore Group Plc was founded in 1992 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

2.Name: Mr. Robert Noordhoek Hegt
2.Title: Global Head of Institutional Account Management

4.Name: Ms. Alexandra Frances Autrey
4.Title: Group Head of Legal & Transaction Management and Group Company Sec.
